attributes.action: re-build the 1996 world championship bmx track (brighton)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in 1996 the bmx world championships were helds in brighton (sussex). since then the specially built track has fallen into dis-repair. with the help of this petition the aim is to get brighton and hove city council to fund the reburbishment of the track
